name: Six-sided and Loaded
description:
We are aware of the error! If you change the name of the .exe to DiceKek it should work. Sadly, we noticed this after the Jam period finished.

Submission for the GMTK Game Jam 2022 (Its our first game yet!).

As a dice, dodge enemies while you try to  shoot them in turn-based combat.

What we've done:
  • Grid System
  • Player Base Model
  • Enemy base model
  • Attack base model.
What we planned doing:
  • 6 different waves. 
  • Every time you beat a wave you replace one of your sides with a special hability.
  • A final wave, once you have your build done, with a special twist.
  • Menu, interface, options, etc.
  • More effects, sprites, sounds and background music(everything was done by us, so heavy lacking of time).
  • Damage face based (once hit on one face this becomes unable to cast)

This prototype was done during half the weekend as it was as much time as we had. 

Every asset and code was done by us as a practice exercise.
